Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1982...
Injured on 5/30/1983 with a Torn Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1986, off John Malone (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/14/1986, off Robert Gass (CI)...
Injured on 8/20/1989 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/19/1992 to a 4-year deal worth $1,262,100 per year...
